verbose_text: Administration of VPS34-IN1 to cells induces a rapid dose dependent dispersal of a specific PtdIns (3) P binding probe from endosome membranes, within 1 min, without affecting the ability of class I PI3K to regulate Akt.
evidence: VPS34-IN1 to cells induces a rapid dose-dependent dispersal of a specific PtdIns(3)P-binding probe from endosome membranes, within 1 min, without affecting the ability of class I PI3K
